title: Peer Assessment-Based Project Design for Collaborative Learning Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Assessment environment utilizing smartphone-based collaboration tools and simple online survey platforms.

learning_goals: Learners can present at least three fair criteria for evaluating peers' contributions during project implementation
Learners can diagnose their collaborative competencies on a 5-point scale based on peer assessment results
Learners can identify at least two problems occurring during group activities and propose improvement strategies
Learners can write comprehensive feedback on final project outcomes using individual/group evaluation metrics

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
